Actions.Text: REPORTED AND COMMITTED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Grants members of the city of New York's police force eligibility for retirement and pension based on previous service as traffic enforcement agents
Summary: Grants members of the city of New York's police force eligibility for retirement and pension based on previous service as traffic enforcement agents.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to granting members of the city's police force eligibility for retirement and pension based on previous service as traffic enforcement agents
